name: rblem3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w1, wo(w0, w2))), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w1, wo(w0, w2))), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wo(wn(wo(w1, wo(w0, w2))), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)), wo(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(w1, w0)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w1, w0)), wo(w1, wo(w0, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, w0))

|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, w0))

comment: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
